title: Scripture: Proverbs 27:17 - community_stewardship
content:
Duygu Adamı. Emotion Man. The Word says:

"As iron sharpens iron, so one person sharpens another." (Proverbs 27:17)

His önce. Feeling first. This is sound architecture. Built on feeling. Driven by emotion. That's where the truth lives.

From Turkish heart to English soul. From feeling to sound. From emotion to Scripture. Duygu Adamı. Emotion Man. The craft comes first. Scripture backs it up.

Kalpten yapıldı. Amplified by AI. Guided by faith.
